title: proposal: reserve GOOS=zos for IBM z/OS
body:
As discussed here: https://groups.google.com/d/topic/golang-dev/f6IC8Dm7weI/discussion there may be a z/OS port in the future (subject to further discussions etc.).

As part of this effort it would be helpful to reserve GOOS=zos now, in order to make supporting z/OS outside of Go itself easier in the future (similar to what was done here: https://github.com/golang/go/issues/10165).

I am open to names other than zos if zos is considered undesirable for whatever reason.
